articles.title: Alvaro J. Pereira Filho
articles.contents:

              Alvaro J. Pereira Filho

            Welcome!
            Alvaro J. Pereira Filho is a researcher specializing in
            Canadian and comparative politics at Western University,
            Canada. His research primarily centers on partisanship and
            electoral behavior, and he actively collaborates with
            scholars from various disciplines, including political
            psychology and sociology. His work has been featured in
            Opinião Pública and Innovation in
            Aging.
            
            Education
            University of Western Ontario | Ontario,
            Canada
            Ph.D. in Political Science | September 2019 - Present
            Universidade de Brasilia | Distrito
            Federal, Brasil
            M.A. in Political Science | March 2015 - June 2017
            B.S. in Political Science | August 2008 - October
            2012
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Alvaro J. Pereira Filho
